mapper.insert: insert into qna (user_no, item_no, title, content, password, Answer) values (#{user_no},#{item_no},#{title},#{content},#{password},"확인 안함")
mapper.select: select q.qna_no ,q.title, u.id ,q.Answer from qna q inner join user u using(user_no);
